Description:
Extract data from cab file and hide it in an alternate data stream

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Extrac32 Alternate Data Stream Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%extrac32.exe%' and command like '%.cab%') and command re ':[^\\]'
